privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is our priority. Learn how we protect your data.

overview.title: Privacy Overview
overview.description: RateVault is designed with privacy as a core principle. We collect minimal data, store everything locally on your device, and never track or monitor your usage. This policy explains our privacy practices in detail.

localStorage.title: Local Storage Only
localStorage.description: All your data is stored locally in your browser's storage. We never send this data to external servers.
items: Cached exchange rates for offline use

noPersonalData.title: No Personal Information
noPersonalData.description: We do not collect, store, or process any personal information such as names, email addresses, phone numbers, or location data.

noTracking.title: No Tracking or Analytics
noTracking.description: We do not use cookies, analytics tools, tracking pixels, or any other monitoring technologies to track your behavior.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.description: All data stored locally is used solely to enhance your experience:
purposes: Remember your pinned currencies between sessions
Store custom exchange rates for 'what-if' scenarios
Cache exchange rates for offline functionality
Preserve your language and display preferences
Enable PWA features like offline access

exchangeApi.title: Exchange Rate API
exchangeApi.description: We use ExchangeRate-API to fetch current exchange rates. This service may collect minimal data for rate limiting. We recommend reviewing their privacy policy:

security.title: Data Security
security.description: Your data security is ensured through local storage and privacy-by-design principles:
measures: All data is stored locally on your device
No data transmission to our servers
No user accounts or authentication required
Full user control over data deletion

pwa.title: Progressive Web App Features
pwa.description: When you install RateVault as a PWA, additional data may be cached for offline functionality:

offlineData.title: Offline Cache
offlineData.description: App assets and recent exchange rates are cached locally to enable offline use. This cache is managed automatically and can be cleared through your browser settings.

rights.title: Your Data Rights
rights.description: Since all data is stored locally on your device, you have full control:
list: View all stored data through browser developer tools
Delete all app data by clearing browser storage
Export your preferences manually if needed
Control what data is stored through app settings
Uninstall the PWA to remove all cached data

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this privacy policy periodically. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. We encourage you to review this policy regularly.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact us through our GitHub repository:
